name: Layers (itch) (kiwi)
description:
Made by Kpolr and Kiwi for the Interstellar Game Jam

A very short 2D puzzle game that allows you to move on the third dimension to reach hidden parts of a level.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

IJKL to pan camera

ESC to go back to menu

The game does save level progress btw.

 This was my first full game made in unity so hf. Might update game after game jam if bothered. 

Assets all made by kiwi and kpolr.
